TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppWidgetManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Updates AppWidget state; gets information about installed AppWidget providers and other AppWidget related state.

Activity action to launch from your activity when you want to bind an AppWidget to display and bindAppWidgetIdIfAllowed returns false.
Sent when it is time to configure your AppWidget while it is being added to a host.
Sent when an instance of an AppWidget is deleted from its host.
Sent when the last AppWidget of this provider is removed from the last host.
Sent when an instance of an AppWidget is added to a host for the first time.
Sent to widget hosts after AppWidget state related to the host has been restored from backup.
Sent when the custom extras for an AppWidget change.
Activity action to launch from your activity when you want to pick an AppWidget to display.
Sent to an after AppWidget state related to that provider has been restored from backup.
Sent when it is time to update your AppWidget.

An intent extra that contains one appWidgetId.

An intent extra attached to the broadcast, indicating the integer ID of the host whose widgets have just been restored.
